channel.title: Question

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Ok, I have a dfs method, and I want it to hit like DeltaScapes. It hits at the xact same time as a whip, so there isnt secondary damage. How would I make it have a delay so it hits after a weapon? here is my method.

public void dfs() { if(misc.random(7) == 1) { hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(40); stillgfx(1, EnemyY, EnemyX); sendMessage("The heat of your shield hurts your opponent!"); } }

Thanks

Read full topic
